reviews.review: Начали играть с другом, после 4 миссии создали  портальную петлю. 10 порталов из 10

esqueci de analisar este dps que analisei o Alan Wake,mas cara,eu vou dizer,este jogo tem muito puzzle daora,histórinha daora e tem personagens muito legais,apesar de serem poucos,o Whitley e a GladOS são daoras,e a assim como o Primeiro jogo,o uso de portais era bom demais,ja no segunda eles melhorarao tudo,e recomendo jogarem este jogo,do inicio ate o fim,sério vejam ate o fim.e este jogo veio com várias legendas em várias linguas,incluindo portugues(de Portugal eu acho)mas de qualquer forma,é portugues,show de bolas

Das Spiel Portal 2 ist mit das Coolste Spiel, welches ich je gespielt habe. Die Grafik, die Story, die Musik bzw. Sounds und die Idee, mit den zwei Portalen rufen ein außerordentlich spannendes, aufregendes, beeindruckendes und lustiges Spielerlebnis hervor.
Meine Hochachtung an die Entwickler/innen. Mein einziges Problem ist, dass ich Portal 2 seit MacOS Catalina nicht mehr spielen kann,
da Catalina 32-bit-Programme dummerweise nicht unterstützt.
Ich würde mich echt freuen, wenn eine Version von Portal 2 herauskommen könnte, die mit MacOS Catalina kompatibel ist.
Vielen Dank an die Entwickler/innen
Leonhard Heinze
yes good yes very fun yes hai watashi wa
Love it! If you have played the first one, get it, if you havent played the first one, go buy it, play it, and then come back and play this one cause it is veeery good

Amazing Seq. to portal


Story telling ✔
atmosphere ✔
Mechanics   ✔
Level Design ✔

Portal 2 is the second part of the first-person puzzle from Valve, which continues to experiment with the player and portals. Many years have passed since the first part of the game, and the Aperture laboratory lies in ruins. The main character of the game, Chell, wakes up in one of the many chambers inside the laboratory, and makes another attempt to escape from the laboratory, which ends completely differently than the girl expected. The heroine will have to learn a lot about the past of the company, meet completely new heroes and even help an old opponent in her difficult mission.

In addition to the story mode, Portal 2 can offer a two-player cooperative game mode, in which the main characters are the robots Atlas and P-Body, performing various tasks for GLaDOS. These quests have a separate storyline that does not overlap with Chell's storyline in any way, and which leads to an unexpected ending.
Its very well mad with a good story i cant do anything except recommend it further

Lo giro in 1920x1080 a 60 fps fissi in grafica minima con un i5-2500, 8 GB di RAM e una gt 730

Игра очень понравилась, в отличии от первой части есть более крутой сюжет. Знаю играю в игру довольно поздновато, ну да почему бы нет. Прикольные шутки, которые не все могут понять и многое другое, хорошо вписываются в игру. В некоторых моментах тупил и не понимал что делать, но довольно быстро разбирался в этом. В и тоге все эти плюсы сделали эту игру идеальной для меня, поэтому я ставлю 10 нейротоксинов из 10

Fena olmayan bir puzzle oyunu. Co-op olması güzel ama bir puzzle oyununda tek başına iyi bölüm tasarımı olunca ben istediğimi bulamıyorum. Bunun yanında iyi de bir hikaye anlatması lazım ki Portal 2'de bu yoktu. Kötü bir oyun diyemem ama ben istediğimi bulamadığım için tavsiye etmiyorum. Baya benzeyen "The Turing Test" daha ilgi çekici gelmişti bana. Gerek hikayesiyle gerek daha zor olmasıyla daha çok beğenmiştim onu. Belki de onu oynadıktan sonra puzzle oyununa doyduğum için Portal 2'de aradığımı bulamamışımdır ama benim için bir hayal kırıklığıydı Portal 2. 4/10
it is good but play the frist game before this one

一款非常有趣的解密游戏的下一代也非常有趣
Absolutely amazing game, a true masterpiece of puzzle solving and story telling.

Simply put, Portal 2 is a masterpiece, just like it's predecessor. Valve makes clever use of the environment to reveal more about Aperture Science than you could learn in any of Rattman's hideouts from the first game. The puzzles, while seemingly smaller, are as complex and as fun to complete as in Portal. Each chamber feels fresh and builds on the last, and never feels like a recycled concept from the first game. Gone are the energy-balls and in their place are laser-beams and the new repulsion, emulsion, and conversion gels which add a new and exciting level of complexity to the test chambers. GLaDOS' is as sarcastic and witty as ever, and Wheatley, your personality core companion for the majority of the game is equally well voiced & written. My only complaint is that we didn't see more of the companion cube, and that the chambers felt smaller than in the first game. TL;DR - You owe it to yourself to play this game, Portal 2 is a an absolute masterpiece. There is a reason that Gabe Newell said that this was his favorite game to come out of Valve.

Отличная игра, но если вы человек который сыграл в первую часть и теперь хотите поиграть в вторую, то знайте - в отличии от первой части, вторая больше ориентирована на веселье нежели на чувства которые испытывались в первой части начиная с саундтреков заканчивая самой игрой. Прохождение основной компании занимает около 8 часов, также в игре есть кооперативный режим и редактор тестов, но если вам мало функций и предметов в редакторе - скачивайте BEE2.
